channel.title: Need help with an auto downloading cache

item.title: Need help with an auto downloading cache
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

[quote=“Carmex, post:6, topic:519582”]okay i put my cache at dropbox.com and updated the links but when i jar it still wont work

[code] private double VERSION1;

    /*
     * The direct download URL for the zipped cache.
     * Current State: "https://www.dropbox.com/s/zsj1w4akxcnxgn6/LostLegacyCache.zip"
     * @author Shamon King
     */
    
private String cacheLink = "https://www.dropbox.com/s/zsj1w4akxcnxgn6/LostLegacyCache.zip";

private String fileToExtract = getCacheDir() + getArchivedName();

    /*
     * The updateAvailable flag.
     * Current State: Uninitialized.[/code][/quote]show us the error

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with an auto downloading cache

item.title: Need help with an auto downloading cache
item.dc:creator: @Vain1 Vain_
item.description:
@Vain1 wrote:

you cannot expect people to auto download a cache when the url is set to a local file on your harddrive.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with an auto downloading cache
item.dc:creator: @Carmex Carmex
item.description:
@Carmex wrote:

I need my cache to auto download so I can make a webclient someone help please
also idk if this willl help at all but here…

[code] private double VERSION1;

    /*
     * The direct download URL for the zipped cache.
     * Current State: "C:\Users\noah\LostLegacyCache"
     * @author Shamon King
     */
    
private String cacheLink = "C:\users\noah\lostLegacyCache";

private String fileToExtract = getCacheDir() + getArchivedName();

    /*
     * The updateAvailable flag.
     * Current State: Uninitialized.
     * @author TRMayhem[/code]
